name: @qiwi/npm-batch-client-monorepo
description: Utility wraps https://github.com/npm/npm-registry-client to perform batched actions

scripts.coveralls:push: cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls || echo 'coveralls push failed :(' && exit 0
scripts.postupdate: yarn && yarn bootstrap && npx yarn-audit-fix --audit-level=moderate && yarn clean && yarn build && yarn test
scripts.postupdate:local: yarn postupdate && say postupdate succeeded || say postupdate failed
